official_title: A bill to amend the Act establishing the Petrified Forest National Park.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Amends the Act establishing the Petrified Forest National Park, Arizona, to include additional lands in such Park.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act establishing the Petrified Forest National Park.
